https://github.com/intel-gpu/drm-uapi-helper/tree/master/drm-uapi

Base commit:
https://github.com/intel-gpu/drm-uapi-helper/commit/858244c3b408e08872b32bf6bd1fd22077f5d6c1

Author: Ashutosh Dixit <ashutosh.dixit@intel.com>
Date:   20 Mar 2023 21:28:47 +01:00

Description:

	prelim v2.0-rc17
		* No compatibility breakage in PRELIM uapi
		* Other changes shown below

	drm.h:
		* Support for advance degamma mode UAPI

	i915_drm_prelim.h:
		* Support for reporting LMEM Sparing via UEVENT
		* New GT errors on PVC
		* Debugger ABI version getparam
		* L3 Bank Count query
		* LMEM memory region info query

	Signed-off-by: Ashutosh Dixit <ashutosh.dixit@intel.com>
	
https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/mesa/drm/
xf86drm.h updated to
https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/mesa/drm/-/commit/baa4b8cafca0d52189bfd6e7cda9c558a261ae71
